name: Cattle Juice
description:
FOOD IS READY

====

As the newest harvesting operator our of the academy, your duty is to harvest the mature cattle population of the planet "breeding ground 72". Use your workforce to catch cattle and extract their delicious juices.

The cattle has a tendency to escape and even fight back, hopefully, our superior technology, bombs and tools will help you succeed.

Oh?! And did I mention? Our home world is hungry, every week you will have to pay the "Weekly Cattle Juice Tax". Fail to do so and... we may have to reprocess you.

DELICIOUS JUICES

====

In *Cattle Please*, you try to eradicate the population of the world.

# Controls 

  • Interact with stuff: Mouse left click
  • Cancel: Mouse right click
  • Toggle fullscreen: F11
  • Alp+P: On desktop - take a screenshot under Godot userdata folder |

# Programs

  • Game made using Godot Engine 3.5
  • Game Graphics: Stable Diffusion, Paint.net, Aseprite, Krita
  • Game Music: Royality free
  • SoundFx: Royality free
  • Sound Editor: Audacity

P.S: We will be playing lots of game entries this time and stream live on twitch. We will be happy to play your game. Come joins us live and submit your game for us to play on https://www.twitch.tv/tobugis!
